description:
Cocoa and friends are shopping for mugs when they meet Sharo, an underclassman at Lize`s school who`s also a childhood friend of Chiya`s. Later, Chiya is worried that Sharo is working in some shady establishment, so she and the other girls decide to infiltrate Sharo`s workplace.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Do You Remember the Day You First Got Drunk? You Tried to Light a Campfire in Your Own Home, Didn`t You?
Hajimete Yotta Hi no Koto Oboeteru? Jibun no Ie de Campfire Shiyou to Shita wa yo ne
Te souviens-tu de la dernière fois où tu étais soûl ? Tu essayais d’allumer un feu de camp chez toi
初めて酔った日の事憶えてる? 自分の家でキャンプファイヤーしようとしたわよね
